mapper.select: SELECT group_name AS groupname,A.group_id AS id,avatar FROM user_group_info AS A INNER JOIN group_info AS B WHERE A.group_id=B.group_id AND A.user_id=#{id};
SELECT packet_name ,C.packet_id FROM user_packet_info AS A INNER JOIN packet_info AS C ON A.packet_id=C.packet_id WHERE A.user_id=#{id};

SELECT E.user_id AS id,username,sign,avatar,status FROM user_packet_info AS A INNER JOIN packet_user_info AS E ON A.packet_id=E.packet_id INNER JOIN user_info AS B ON E.user_id=B.user_id AND B.user_id!=A.user_id WHERE E.packet_id=#{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET status=#{status} WHERE user_id=#{id};
UPDATE user_info SET sign=#{sign} WHERE user_id=#{id};
